body: "One of the most striking aspects of Marley’s songwriting is his authenticity": Diaspora litblogger Geoffrey Philp wonders if bloggers can learn a few lessons from the late reggae great.
original_body: "One of the most striking aspects of Marley’s songwriting is his authenticity": Diaspora litblogger Geoffrey Philp wonders if bloggers can learn a few lessons from the late reggae great.
title: Jamaica: Lessons from Marley

sentence: "One of the most striking aspects of Marley’s songwriting is his authenticity": Diaspora litblogger Geoffrey Philp wonders if bloggers can learn a few lessons from the late reggae great.
